description: platform-independent application to facilitate the quality control of alignment sequencing data.
publications: Fernando García-Alcalde, Konstantin Okonechnikov, José Carbonell, Luis M. Cruz, Stefan Götz, Sonia Tarazona, Joaquín Dopazo, Thomas F. Meyer, and Ana Conesa "Qualimap: evaluating next-generation sequencing alignment data." Bioinformatics 28, no. 20 (2012): 2678-2679.
name: qualimap
